configuration.name: Base URL
configuration.description: Base url, fxpractice for sandbox, fxtrade for live accounts

configuration.name: Default select fields
configuration.description: Generic map used to specify default fields for bulk download and GET /all requests. Each key should be the canonical objectName and values may be specified as a comma-delimited string or a list of strings
Used to enable/disable filtering of null values from the responses
configuration.name: Filter null values from the response
Event Notification Instance Finder
configuration.description: Oanda This helps find all instances pertaining to an incoming event. The EVENT_NOTIFICATION_INSTANCE_FINDER is composed of two values, in the form "[INSTANCE_CONFIG_PROPERTY_KEY]|[JSON_PATH_TO_PROPERTY_VALUE]". The first value, INSTANCE_CONFIG_PROPERTY_KEY, is the element config key that we will use to determine which instances this event pertains to.  The second value, JSON_PATH_TO_PROPERTY_VALUE, is the JSON XPath to the event JSON that we will use to lookup the instances.  For example, GitHub sends the organization name back in their response, and we save this element config value as "github.organization", so the instance finder for GitHub would be "github.organization|organization.login"

parameters.name: sinceTransactionId
parameters.description: ID of the Transaction to get Account changes since.

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: The number of resources to return in a given page

parameters.name: where
parameters.description: The CEQL search expression - Requires at least one instrument, ex. instruments='EUR_USD'
